Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed a Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are still standing at Clark/Lake due to an obstruction. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are still standing at Clark/Lake due to an obstruction. 

  • At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:
  • #22 Clark
  • #24 Wentworth
  • #29 State
  • #36 Broadway
  • #60 Blue Island
  • #124 Navy Pier
  • #134 Stockton Express
  • #156 LaSalle 

Red Line and Green Line trains.

  • Shuttle buses are available between LaSalle ad grand to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 20 Madison rtd WB via Mdsn, Homan, Wshngtn, Cntrl Park & Madison; EB via Madison, Cntrl Park, Wshngtn, Warren, Homan & Madison due to blockage nr Madison/Hamlin

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Madison/Hamlin.

  • Westbound buses will operate via via Madison, Homan, Washington, Central Park and Madison.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Central Park, Washington, Warren, Homan and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
